text: “Gei tangada hai hegau gaa hana gi muli, ga hagi anga gi dono dangada aamua nia mee huogodoo ala ne hai. Gei tangada aamua gu hagawelewele huoloo, ga helekai boloo, ‘Hana gi hongo nia ala llauehe mo lligi o di waahale, laha mai digau hagaloale, digau mooho nadau huaidina, digau deegida, mo digau habehabe.’
